narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Geisinger Clinic is a Surgery provider based in Danville, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $74.5M in Medicaid payments across 1.7M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $74.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
